extDesc.message: Provides context menus to open images, whatever they are background images or not.

dispImg_newTab.message: Open image in a new tab

dispBackImg_newTab.message: Open background image in a new tab

noBackImg_content.message: It seems there is no background image here.

loadingDOM_content.message: The webpage isn't completely loaded, you must wait until the end.

error_content.message: An unexpected error has been thrown, try again.

firstImgTab_content.message: You can press the space key to display details about the image
